alert.note: Alert for Coeur d'Alene Area (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 6:25PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Shoshone, north central Benewah and southeastern Kootenai Counties through 600 PM PDT... At 525 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Harrison, or 10 miles north of St. Maries, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pinehurst, Fourth Of July Pass, Medimont, Kingston, Rose Lake and Cataldo. This includes Interstate 90 in Idaho between mile markers 27 and 44. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
